title: Sales Lab Setup Completion
description: Verify that the Sales Lab setup stage completes successfully with valid input and transitions to Roleplay Chat.

steps.description: Navigate to Sales Lab page
Fill in all required setup fields with valid and realistic data
Submit the setup form
Check that the system proceeds to Roleplay Chat stage without errors

title: Sales Lab Roleplay Chat Interaction
description: Verify user can interact with AI customer using chat interface and receive appropriate AI responses during Sales Lab roleplay.

steps.description: Enter Sales Lab Roleplay Chat stage after setup
Send a valid sales-related message to AI customer
Verify that AI customer responds with contextually relevant and coherent replies

title: Voice Interaction in Sales Lab: Speech-to-Text and Text-to-Speech
description: Validate the voice interaction functionality including speech-to-text input and text-to-speech output during Sales Lab chat.

steps.description: Enable voice mode in the Sales Lab chat interface
Listen to AI customer's text-to-speech playback for a chat response
Confirm that TTS plays fully before microphone auto-activates for STT input
Respond verbally to AI customer and check speech is transcribed correctly into chat input
Verify the recognized speech is accurately converted using STT and sent as chat input

title: Sales Lab Session Termination by User Intent
description: Ensure Sales Lab session ends naturally when user indicates goodbye or purchase intent.

steps.description: During Sales Lab roleplay chat, input user utterance expressing goodbye or clear purchase intent
Verify that the system terminates the session and proceeds to feedback stage

title: Sales Lab Feedback Generation Accuracy
description: Check that detailed performance feedback is generated accurately after Sales Lab session.

steps.description: Complete a Sales Lab session including Setup and Roleplay Chat
Verify that detailed feedback is generated based on user performance and displayed to the user

title: AI Chatbot Markdown Rendering and Response Splitting
description: Verify AI Chatbot responses are split into summary and detailed sections, and markdown including tables and bold text is rendered properly.

steps.description: Open AI Chatbot and submit a question requesting detailed explanation
Check that the response is split into a clear summary block and a detailed information section
Verify markdown elements such as tables and bold text appear correctly formatted in the chat interface

title: AI Chatbot Persistent Voice Mode Functionality
description: Verify that voice mode in AI Chatbot supports speaking responses aloud and accepting voice input persistently.

steps.description: Activate voice mode in AI Chatbot interface
Request a response from AI Chatbot and listen to spoken output
Confirm spoken response matches the text response
Respond verbally and check that voice input is correctly captured and processed

title: Chat History Persistence Using IndexedDB and LocalStorage
description: Validate that all chat histories for AI Chatbot and Sales Lab are saved and restored correctly across sessions using IndexedDB or LocalStorage.

steps.description: Use AI Chatbot and Sales Lab chat to create chat history with multiple messages
Close and reopen the browser or reload the application
Verify chat history is fully restored and user can scroll through previous chats

title: Admin Console User Management
description: Verify administrators can log in to Admin Console, view user lists, add new users, edit existing users, and delete users.

steps.description: Log in to Admin Console with valid admin credentials
Navigate to user management section
Add a new user with valid details
Confirm new user appears in user list
Edit an existing userâ€™s details and save changes
Verify updated details are saved and displayed correctly
Delete a user from the list
Confirm user is removed from the user list successfully

title: Admin Console Content and Product Management
description: Verify administrators can manage content and product data including adding, editing, and deleting records through simulated backend APIs.

steps.description: Access content management in Admin Console
Add new content item with all required fields
Confirm content item is listed correctly
Edit an existing content item and save changes
Verify updates are reflected accurately
Delete a product record via product management section
Verify product record is removed without errors

title: Study Room Tabbed Navigation
description: Verify Study Room interface supports tabbed navigation and displays appropriate educational materials on each tab.

steps.description: Navigate to Study Room page
Click on each tab available in Study Room
Verify that the content displayed updates according to the selected tab without delay or glitches

title: Home Dashboard User Progress Overview and Navigation
description: Check Home Dashboard displays correct user progress information and provides working shortcuts to all main features.

steps.description: Access Home Dashboard after logging in as a user
Verify overview widgets display accurate and up-to-date progress metrics
Use quick access shortcuts to navigate to Sales Lab, AI Chatbot, Study Room, and Admin Console (if admin)
Confirm navigation shortcuts work without errors and load correct pages

title: Sales Lab Auto Mode TTS and STT Sequence
description: Ensure that in Sales Lab Auto Mode, text-to-speech plays fully before the microphone auto-activates for speech-to-text input without overlap or failure.

steps.description: Enable Auto Mode in Sales Lab and start a chat interaction
Confirm that TTS plays the AI response fully before the microphone activates automatically
Speak a response and verify STT captures it correctly

title: Chat Interface Usability on Mobile Devices
description: Verify on mobile devices that input chat interface is not obscured by on-screen keyboard and remains fully usable.

steps.description: Open Sales Lab chat or AI Chatbot on a variety of mobile devices and browsers
Focus the chat input field to trigger on-screen keyboard
Confirm the chat input is fully visible and accessible above the keyboard and user can see recent messages

title: Error Handling on Invalid Setup Input
description: Validate that the Sales Lab setup stage properly handles invalid inputs by showing user-friendly error messages and preventing progression.

steps.description: Navigate to Sales Lab setup stage
Enter invalid or incomplete input fields
Attempt to submit the setup form
Verify that appropriate validation error messages appear and setup does not proceed

title: Error Handling on Simulated Backend API Failures
description: Test Admin Console behavior when simulated backend API calls fail, ensuring appropriate error messages and system stability.

steps.description: Simulate backend API failure for user or content management operations
Perform an operation such as adding or deleting a user or content item
Verify clear error messages are displayed and the Admin Console remains responsive without crashes

title: Security: Admin Console Access Control
description: Ensure that only authorized admin users can access the Admin Console and regular users are restricted.

steps.description: Attempt to access Admin Console as a regular user without admin privileges
Confirm access is denied or redirected to unauthorized page
Log in as an admin user and access the Admin Console
Verify admin pages are accessible and load correctly
